column5: Party of 4 looking for some imput on a decent resort for end of July - 1st of Aug for a stay of 4-5 days of GOOD fishing. Help me out!
Check out Birch Dale Lodge on Eagle Lake www.birchdalelodge.com 807-227-5262 owners name is Marcel.

Check out Young's Wilderness Camp on Lake of the Woods! Owners are Perry & Carol. Great camp, excellent lodging, staff, boats and 5 star cooking! Fabulous fishing!! (http://www.youngswildernesscamp.com/)

I love http://www.tamarackislandwildernesslodge.com/ in the Morson area of LOTW. My favorite times for walleye are may and September(You barely have try in May and you will catch fish) but the fishing is fantastic all year.

Greetings,I will second the earlier post on Stormer Lake Lodge. I consistently found that the walleye fishing for this drive-to lodge surpassed that for all of my fly-in fishing trips. Check out this thread for additional information:https://www.walleyecentral.com/forums...ss+lake&page=2Good fishing and tight lines!!
